nodes.text: Pikk Mukmuk was a Kowakian monkey-lizard kept as a pet by Hondo Ohnaka along side his brother Pilf. Pikk was a member of the Ohnaka Gang, helping Hondo Ohnaka to do his dirty work. At some point, Ohnaka lost Mukmuk and stated that he never truly appreciated him until he was gone.
Pikk Mukmuk was voiced by Matt Lanter, who also provided the voice of Anakin Skywalker in Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
